# Androma Live Peers
Here is a list of active peers. Add them to your `config.toml` if you have trouble finding peers.

Here is a script for you to update `persistent_peers` setting with these peers in `config.toml`.

```
PEERS=fba36f2839f147548b876f50b02f08a7fff252fe@65.109.34.9:26656,1a9279f3c3694a022b53de960db553509cb63016@65.108.75.32:31656,91efe71a306d0f16e51cca4ec5280bedde58a1e8@95.217.118.96:26989,4d6e5790be281a584c9226749a4d09ce14fabd02@65.108.194.40:32656,fc6f7914e4beb4b5278e7ba32ec2abde97cd8082@65.109.28.177:26656,6ca9cc12c3448b22fc51f8ba11eb62b7cb667f04@65.108.132.239:26856,715e0a5f215822c401441033d45dd74d190bc6f7@65.108.238.217:26656,73a679ef0a381ec15b20dca64f91b1bd0781308a@65.109.53.53:05656,0d14834f1f03b2193655e7c48512cc1a913e6778@65.109.85.170:36656,06767acbb0347198b52c55fbea8d0edc33230e9b@135.181.24.128:26656,d7fc790e005d7cdc0700d7ea527a5ee5131a49aa@199.175.98.101:14656,cf99fc36374b48aad8c3e5acfd4e1963da853fae@65.109.17.86:38656,c64ea1d95bcf1e5c02b73027b50787f96dae774e@38.242.250.77:26656,9943fed25f830a8c0eaa63efa9e637c1875bfdc8@38.242.219.158:26656,1b8c61cd6953892408abb2f899e6d0904cfaf36c@195.201.165.123:21076,b4813c02f9497e5a92013c9c55fccae4a0283516@23.121.249.57:26656,3187d87d3126ae2b58d4e520aec4427e75505a38@159.65.53.15:14656,401c3d7ce63bb8691d7a3ee2781fad96294bdca8@173.249.31.88:26656,e398049084b0e136c3bad7ad5f5b245bf216f385@161.97.109.47:26656,5ea3936c216086937677764fbf4a2326fdb7fc6f@185.182.184.200:36656,93d68953fa8760fa8491de31385f24fd397169c3@162.19.93.20:26656,b4dc2ce669832b3492b95a31ba6db1b4f1b26d8a@209.145.53.163:23656,600410eead9d886603399808ed741ea03ee34c58@3.138.138.247:26656,a10bc5db66353653ec594a2670035ca3f91c707c@45.67.32.53:56656,cef4eebc57cdff130c4f0fb91f1c9e85fdb32a41@181.41.142.78:11564,76b1343da5f76dcbef3c50c49f2811eab95129cf@65.108.195.235:23656,182469c7d71c9854cb7ec7863ac97f6345d13d7c@142.132.199.27:21076
sed -i.bak -e "s/^persistent_peers *=.*/persistent_peers = \"$PEERS\"/" $HOME/.androma/config/config.toml

```
